contentrichtext.text: '''Preston Smith''' may refer to: * [[Preston Smith (American football)]], American football coach at Colgate University * [[Preston Smith (governor)]] (1912–2003), Texas governor, 1969–1973 * [[Preston Smith (general)]], Civil War Confederate general * [[Preston Smith (Georgia state politician)]], Georgia state senator, 2002–present * [[Preston Smith (musician)]], singer/songwriter from Houston, Texas * Preston Smith (sound engineer), [[45th Grammy Awards#Classical|Grammy-winning]] recording engineer * [[Lubbock Preston Smith International Airport]], an airport in Texas, USA {{hndis|name=Smith, Preston}}
